descriptions.required: *: The input fields with '*' are required.
descriptions.size: The number of questions the quiz will have.
descriptions.instruction: e.g. Write down the meaning of underlined phrases.
descriptions.advanced: These options are for advanced users. Please keep them untouched unless you know what you are doing.

unexpected.name: Unexpected Error
unexpected.message: Unexpected error has occurred. Please reload the page. Your data is automatically saved to your computer, and may be recovered after reloading.

failToLoadMaterials.name: Load Error
failToLoadMaterials.message: Failed to fetch the materials list. Please contact with the server administrator.

failToLoadSources.name: Load Error
failToLoadSources.message: Failed to fetch the sources list. Please contact with the server administrator.

failToLoadPresets.name: Load Error
failToLoadPresets.message: Failed to fetch the presets list. Please contact with the server administrator.

noSelectedSources.name: Invalid Settings
noSelectedSources.message: You should select at least one of the sources.

brokenSuccessFlag.name: Generator Runtime Error (-1)
brokenSuccessFlag.message: Failed to generate questions. Please go back to the settings page and check your configurations.

noGeneratedQuestions.name: Generator Runtime Error (-2)
noGeneratedQuestions.message: Failed to generate questions. Please go back to the settings page and check your configurations.

unknownGeneratorError.name: Generator Runtime Error (-3)
unknownGeneratorError.message: Failed to generate questions. Please go back to the settings page and check your configurations.
